RobloxAPIEnabledDatasources.description: The datasources that should be enabled and available.

RobloxAPIEnabledParserFunctions.description: The parser functions that should be enabled. Data parser functions cannot be enabled or disabled here, instead they are enabled if their corresponding data source is enabled.

RobloxAPICachingExpiries.description: The amount of seconds after the cache for a data source expires. '*' is a wildcard for all data sources.

RobloxAPIAllowedArguments.description: The arguments per argument type that are allowed to be used in the extension. If empty, all arguments for the type are allowed.

RobloxAPIRequestUserAgent.description: The user agent that should be used when making requests to the Roblox API.

RobloxAPIDisableCache.description: Whether or not to disable the cache for the extension.
